SynchronousCommand.Description: Move the CustomData file to the working directory

SynchronousCommand.CommandLine: powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command "Register-ScheduledTask -TaskName 'MyStartupScript' -Action (New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'powershell.exe' -Argument '-sta -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -Command `"C:\AzureData\CoderAgent.ps1 ^| Out-File C:\AzureData\CoderAgent.log`"') -Trigger (New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -AtStartup), (New-ScheduledTaskTrigger -Once -At (Get-Date).AddSeconds(15)) -Settings (New-ScheduledTaskSettingsSet -DontStopOnIdleEnd -ExecutionTimeLimit ([TimeSpan]::FromDays(3650)) -Compatibility Win8) -Principal (New-ScheduledTaskPrincipal -UserId 'vm\coder' -RunLevel Highest -LogonType S4U) -Force"
